page.title: 01Beautiful South-West Perth.
page.content: The{south-west of Perth}is very attractive having a wide variety of geographical features, including rolling farmland, woodland, hills and valleys. Our area is bounded by the{ {River Tay}in the east and the{River {Earn}to the south. From the highest point can be seen some excellent recreational facilities, namely the{ {Inch}(a spacious tree-lined park), bowling greens, tennis courts, golf course and a large pitch and putt course. The buildings in this area are mainly residential; modern and old blending together. The imposing prison was built during the{Napoleonic Wars. Thousands of{tourists}who drive north along the Edinburgh Road or the {M90}, must gain a favourable impression as their journey through the {Scottish {Highlands}begins.
